testcase.name: Create a new standard individual checking account
testcase.system-out: Given User is on dBank main login page "https://dbank-qa.wedevx.co/bank/login".passed And User enters userName "anton@email.com" and password "Password123".......passed And creates a new individual checking account with the following data.......passed Then User should see a green confirmation message saying "Successfully created new Standard Checking account named Antons First Checking".passed And User should see the new checking account card...........................passed And User should see the following Transaction menu..........................passed

testcase.name: Verify user cannot login with "<invalidUsername>" and "<invalidPassword>" - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://dbank-qa.wedevx.co/bank/login" is opened;................passed And user entered "notRealName" and "notRealPassword"........................passed Then verify user is not logged..............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify user cannot login with "<invalidUsername>" and "<invalidPassword>" - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://dbank-qa.wedevx.co/bank/login" is opened;................passed And user entered "invalid pass" and "anton@email.com".......................passed Then verify user is not logged..............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify user cannot login with "<invalidUsername>" and "<invalidPassword>" - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://dbank-qa.wedevx.co/bank/login" is opened;................passed And user entered "Password123" and "doesNotExistUsername"...................passed Then verify user is not logged..............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify user can login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://dbank-qa.wedevx.co/bank/login" is opened;................passed And user entered valid "anton@email.com" and "Password123"..................passed Then verify user successfully logged in.....................................passed
